Title: The Light
Writer: Emmanuel Courcol, Claude Faraldo, Gilles Legrand
Actors: Sandrine Bonnaire, Philippe Torreton, Grégori Derangère
Plot: Camille arrives at the island Ouessant where she was born, to sell the house of her parents. She finds a book of a certain Antoine and starts reading. A story of a stranger is told who came 1963 to the island. He wasn't well received and left again after 2 month.
